items.name: Museo Casa Chihuahua
items.description: A museum housed in a historic building showcasing regional history and culture.

items.name: Catedral de Chihuahua
items.address: Av. Independencia 100, Zona Centro, 31000 Chihuahua, Chih.
items.description: An 18th-century baroque cathedral with intricate architecture and rich history.

items.name: Pancho Villa Museum
items.address: Av. División del Norte 2300, Chihuahua, Chih.
items.description: Museum dedicated to the life and legacy of revolutionary leader Pancho Villa.

items.name: Quinta Gameros
items.description: A stunning art nouveau mansion showcasing decorative arts and architecture.

items.name: Grutas Nombre de Dios
items.address: Carretera a Aldama Km 4, Chihuahua, Chih.
items.description: Natural caves with guided tours featuring amazing underground rock formations.

items.name: Parque El Rejón
items.description: Urban park with walking trails, bike lanes, and a tranquil lake.

items.name: Centro Cultural Universitario
items.address: Campus II, Universidad Autónoma de Chihuahua.
items.description: Cultural hub offering art exhibits, theater performances, and concerts.

items.name: La Cabaña Smokehouse
items.address: Periférico de la Juventud 6103, Chihuahua, Chih.
items.description: A local favorite BBQ restaurant known for smoked meats and rustic atmosphere.
